title: Print, "Chiminée decorée de glaces (Fireplace decorated with mirrors), in Livre de décoration de lambris (Book of Panelling Decoration)", 1695–1768
medium: Engraving and etching on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper margin: C. P. S. C. M. / Cheminée decorée de glaces, d'un petit tableau audessous et de deux trumeaux A. et B. aussi de glaces variés différemment; left margin: T; lower margin: [scale] Pieds. / Plan de la tablette de / la Cheminée.; lower right margin: 4
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Fireplace with andirons in Rococo motif, shaped like flames. On left, pedestal supports candelabrum decorated with putti; on right, pedestal supports candelabrum with rocaille motif; behind each are mirrors, left: A; right: B. At center, a mirror framed with rocaille and leaf motifs; at top a mask and image of classical figure with hand on globe in landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Chiminée decorée de glaces (Fireplace decorated with mirrors), in Livre de décoration de lambris (Book of Panelling Decoration)", 1695–1768.
1695–1768. Engraving and etching on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-283-108.
